titles.title: Send The Light (easy nice up tempo)

properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Send the light The blessed gospel light Let it shine From shore to shore Send the light The blessed gospel light Let it shine Forever more{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}There's a call comes ringing O'er the restless wave Send the light send the light There are souls to rescue There are souls to save Send the light send the light{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}We have heard The Macedonian call today Send the light send the light And a golden off'ring At the cross we lay Send the light send the light{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Let us pray that grace May everywhere abound Send the light send the light And a Christ-like spirit Ev'rywhere be found Send the light send the light{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Let us not grow weary In the work of love Send the light send the light Let us gather jewels For a crown above Send the light send the light{/lang-eng}
